Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: She developed relapsed disease 10 months later with leukemic involvement .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| leukemic |

Note: "leukemic" is an adjective derived from the noun "leukemia", which is a type of cancer involving abnormal production of white blood cells. In this context, "leukemic" is used to describe the disease that relapsed and involved white blood cells. Therefore, I have identified "leukemic" as a chemical entity.
